[Home](./index.md) &gt; [scripthost](./scripthost.md) &gt; [ScriptEvalOptions](./scripthost.scriptevaloptions.md) &gt; [timeout](./scripthost.scriptevaloptions.timeout.md)

## ScriptEvalOptions.timeout property

The maximum time, in millseconds, to wait for a result

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
timeout?: number;
```

## Remarks

The default value is specified by the [ScriptHostOptions.defaultTimeout](./scripthost.scripthostoptions.defaulttimeout.md) that was passed to the [ScriptHost](./scripthost.scripthost.md) constructor.

Specify zero or a negative value to wait forever.
